plot: An agoraphobic heroin addict spends his final hours preparing for what he believes to be the end of days.
title: Nihilistic Delusion
plot_es: An agoraphobic heroin addict spends his final hours preparing for what he believes to be the end of days.
plot_en: An agoraphobic heroin addict spends his final hours preparing for what he believes to be the end of days.
